resources.string: We college students have a habit of misplacing things, including our class bunk records. Bunkers-Guide solve this problem.
If "bunk" sounds alien to you,its a school slang used for skipping (not attending) a class
This is your bunk advisor, or in short Bunky. He will keep an eye on your bunks and advise whenever necessary
Lastly, to ensure that you never forget to record bunks, Bunkers-Guide will send you daily notifications. This is fully customizable.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
